question:
Click the Exhibit button. Given the web application deployment descriptor elements:
11.
12. ParamAdder 13. com.example.ParamAdder 14. … 31. 32. ParamAdder 33. Destination 34. … 55. 56. Destination 57. /dest/Destination 58. What is the result of a client request of the Source servlet with no query string?

options.A: The output “filterAdded = null” is written to the response stream.
options.B: The output “filterAdded = addedByFilter” is written to the response stream.
options.C: An exception is thrown at runtime within the service method of the Source servlet.
options.D: An exception is thrown at runtime within the service method of the Destination servlet.
